name: PolyBlaster
description:
WARNING

This game contains flashing imagery, viewer discretion is advised

--CONTROLS--

A and D or Left and Right arrow keys - Move

Space - Shoot

Shift - Small Boost (needs to cool down)

R - Reload

Esc - Main Menu

------------------ABOUT------------------

Get as far as you can in this frantic shoot'em up heavily inspired by weird experimental arcades and games of the 80's and 90's and on the POLYBIUS legend. 

Made in one week for The Dream Arcade Archive Game Jam
